text: ī raṇṭu vibhāgattinumiṭayil oru matiluṇṭāyirikkuṁ. atinṟe mukaḷil cila manuṣyaruṇṭāvuṁ. avarēārēāruttareyuṁ taṅṅaḷuṭe aṭayāḷaṅṅaḷilūṭe tiriccaṟiyuṁ. svargastharēāṭ avar viḷiccupaṟayuṁ: "niṅṅaḷkk samādhānaṁ.” ikkūṭṭar iniyuṁ svargattil pravēśicciṭṭillāttavarāṇ. atēāṭeāppaṁ atāgrahiccukeāṇṭirikkunnavaruṁ
